Title: Stanfield Solid Wood 6 Seater Dining Set With Bench in Warm Chestnut Finish

Details.Dimensions:: Dining Table - H 30 x W 57 x D 35; Chair - H 35 x W 17 x D 17; Bench - H 18 x W 45 x D 16; Seating Height : 18 (All Dimension in Inches)

Description: Reminiscent of yesteryears, Amberville serenades you to discover a distinctive elegance in homes through a seamless blend of classic and colonial styles. Curated for connoisseurs of fine furniture, the range exudes inimitable facets and impeccable craftsmanship that are second to none. Traditional Style takes inspiration from indigenous arts and craft originating from the Indian sub-continent and certain style periods pertaining to the early Baroque and French eras. Traditional furniture is synonymous with artistic embellishments, contrasting inlays, plush fabrics, decorative trims, crown moldings and intricate details. Dining Sets are coordinated table and chair or bench sets. They are large pieces of furniture which will instantly draw attention to itself. Its a focal gathering spot which should be able to accommodate all family members at mealtimes. They come in options of 2,4,6,8-Seater Dining Sets in different design styles.  Furniture bought on Pepperfry.com comes with a 3 Year Warranty against any manufacturing defects. So go ahead and buy with confidence.
